text: Then one of the elders said to me, “Do not weep; behold, the Lion of the tribe of Judah, the Root of David, has 5:5 conquered; he is the one who can 41.7% ¦ conquered so as to Αν ANT BYZ CT PCK TR 53.5%conquered; he is the one who can open the scroll 5:5 and ¦ and break TRand its seven seals.”
